title: RADAR - Watch Face
summary: RADAR Watch Face is an analog watch face with a sleek, modern look to it.
description: RADAR Watch Face is an analog watch face with a sleek, modern look to it. This watch comes with many customizations and configurations to suit any style. These settings can be accessed from long pressing the watch face or directly from the Android Wear app.This watch is compatible with most all Android Wear watches including:Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatchThis is the first watch in a series of high quality watches that I will be releasing soon.INSTALLATION1. Install watch face via Playstore2. Open the "Android Wear" app and select RADAR Watch Face (it may take a full minute for your watch and android wear to sync up)3. Access watch face settings by "Android Wear" app or long pressing watch face on watch and hitting the settings icon.If you have any issues or comments please contact me at mailto:mail.chale@gmail.comThanks to Addie and Tha Phlash
descriptionHTML:
RADAR Watch Face is an analog watch face with a sleek, modern look to it.

This watch comes with many customizations and configurations to suit any style. These settings can be accessed from long pressing the watch face or directly from the Android Wear app.

This watch is compatible with most all Android Wear watches including:
Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch

This is the first watch in a series of high quality watches that I will be releasing soon.

INSTALLATION
1. Install watch face via Playstore
2. Open the "Android Wear" app and select RADAR Watch Face (it may take a full minute for your watch and android wear to sync up)
3. Access watch face settings by "Android Wear" app or long pressing watch face on watch and hitting the settings icon.


If you have any issues or comments please contact me at mailto:mail.chale@gmail.com

Thanks to Addie and Tha Phlash
comments: So refreshing Too many watch faces around are safe and boring, they lack originality.  Not Radar.  This is a face you want in your collection.
This is only watchface that won't show weather app .Worked at first then stopped just can't figer it out.
Great watch! With tons of options, I gat you under my radar...
Smooth As Silk Great looking face from one of my favorite designers. This guy's is always on point with his stuff.
Dope! Always great work from this guy.
